thread.title: Richard
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Richard

author: Richard
title: Richard
text: Very professional, knowledgeable and personable customer service. The fact that I actually spoke to someone in the USA , whose native language is English, enticed me to take the time to listen to C.J's information and to eventually do business with Select Quote: . Kudos to whoever hired this rep.
